name: Teesta River Rafting
description: Thrilling white-water rafting on the Teesta River. Rapids of varying grades make it a favourite for adventure seekers. Ideal between March and May.

name: Mountaineering Expeditions
description: Scale peaks such as Mt. Kanchenjunga, Mt. Kabru, Mt. Siniolchu etc. Permits needed. Best done between April-June and September-November.

name: Yak Safari at Tsomgo Lake
description: Ride a yak around the scenic Tsomgo (Changu) Lake. Offers views of snow-capped mountains and glacial landscapes.

name: Paragliding in Gangtok
description: Soar above the hills and gaze at Himalayan panoramas. Paragliding offers a birdâ€™s eye view of the valleys and rugged terrain.
